name: Vegan Vanilla Cupcakes
description: Simply the best Vegan Vanilla Cupcakes! Tender, fluffy and perfect for birthdays and other celebrations. Easy to make in 1 bowl.
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 cups unsweetened soy milk ((or use another non-dairy milk))

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F and line a 12-cup muffin pan with paper liners. I usually spray the liners with a little oil as well to prevent sticking.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F and line a 12-cup muffin pan with paper liners. I usually spray the liners with a little oil as well to prevent sticking.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the soy milk and apple cider vinegar in a measuring cup or bowl, give a little stir and set aside for a few minutes to curdle.
recipeInstructions.name: Combine the soy milk and apple cider vinegar in a measuring cup or bowl, give a little stir and set aside for a few minutes to curdle.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, sugar, baking powder and salt until combined.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, sugar, baking powder and salt until combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Now pour in the milk/vinegar mixture, canola oil and vanilla. Stir with the whisk, large spoon or a hand mixer until well combined. There may be a few small lumps, but you don't want any large lumps in the batter.
recipeInstructions.name: Now pour in the milk/vinegar mixture, canola oil and vanilla. Stir with the whisk, large spoon or a hand mixer until well combined. There may be a few small lumps, but you don't want any large lumps in the batter.

recipeInstructions.text: Fill the liners 3/4 of the way full and bake for 20-25 minutes, or until a toothpick comes out clean. Carefully transfer the cupcakes to a cooling rack, then place new liners in the pan (probably about 6 more) and bake the rest of the cupcakes until you have used all the batter.
recipeInstructions.name: Fill the liners 3/4 of the way full and bake for 20-25 minutes, or until a toothpick comes out clean. Carefully transfer the cupcakes to a cooling rack, then place new liners in the pan (probably about 6 more) and bake the rest of the cupcakes until you have used all the batter.

recipeInstructions.text: Cool completely, then pipe on Vegan Vanilla Frosting or Vegan Chocolate Frosting.
recipeInstructions.name: Cool completely, then pipe on Vegan Vanilla Frosting or Vegan Chocolate Frosting.

keywords: vegan birthday cupcakes, vegan cupcakes, vegan vanilla cupcakes
